posts.post_content:
For Sale:  T206's, all graded.  All prices delivered, Paypal (payment owed), check or MO.  Most prices at/near VCP average.  PM, Post or Email - first has priority.

*Harry Lentz (Sentz), Pied350, SGC40 **SOLD**
*Eddie Collins, Pied350, SGC40 - $130
*Peter Cassidy, SC350, SGC40 - $45
*Dutch Jordan, Old Mill, SGC40 **SOLD**
*Ed Willett, Pied350, PSA5 - $95
*Fred Snodgrass, Polar, PSA3 - $40
*Wildfire Schulte (Back), Pied350-460, SGC40 - $40 **SOLD**
*Peaches Graham, Pied350, GAI3.5 - $40
*Fred Abbott, SC350, PSA4.5 - $70 (beautiful card/eye-appeal for grade)
*Dummy Taylor, Pied350, SGC40 - $50

Thank you, as always, for your interest!
Bump for price changes on remaining.
